nodes.excerpt: Want to grow your startup? GrowthHackAI is a GPT-3 powered tool that will help you find the perfect growth strategies that will take your business to the next level. 100% Free. No Signup Required.
nodes.title: Growth Hack AI - Free GPT-3 powered growth strategies to boost your startup
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 想让你的初创企业成长？GrowthHackAI是一款由GPT-3驱动的工具，它将帮助你找到完美的增长策略，使你的业务更上一层楼。100%免费。无需注册。

nodes.excerpt: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create aliases, randomly generated email addresses that forward to your real inbox. Use it to protect your online accounts - and your identity - from hackers.
nodes.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.
nodes.author: qztn

localize.description: Firefox Relay 可以轻松创建别名，即随机生成的电子邮件地址，并转发到您的真实收件箱。使用它来保护你的在线账户和你的身份，防止黑客入侵。
localize.tagline: 隐藏您的真实电子邮件地址，以帮助保护您的身份。

localize.description: Firefox Relay 可以輕鬆創建別名，即隨機生成的電子郵件地址，並轉發到您的真實收件箱。使用它來保護你的在線賬戶和你的身份，防止黑客入侵。
localize.tagline: 隱藏您的真實電子郵件地址，以幫助保護您的身份。

nodes.excerpt: The Orbit Shift Podcast is an initiative by Freshworks for Startups to help startups scale. We bring you practical advice from the world’s leading experts to help make better decisions across business functions such as sales, marketing, management, and so on.
nodes.title: The Orbit Shift Podcast - Practical insights for startups looking to scale.

localize.description: Orbit Shift播客是Freshworks for Startups帮助初创企业扩大规模的一项举措。我们为您带来来自全球顶尖专家的实用建议，帮助您在销售、营销、管理等业务职能上做出更好的决策。

localize.tagline: 對於希望擴大規模的初創企業的實用見解。

nodes.excerpt: With Capsule you can collaborate and leave feedback directly on top of any website. Just one click to comment, and another to share it with the world! We automatically organize your feedback in the dashboard. Click —> Comment —> Share & repeat!
nodes.title: Capsule - Visually collaborate on top of any website
nodes.author: Tyler Hayes

localize.description: 有了Capsule，你可以直接在任何网站的顶部进行合作并留下反馈。只需点击一下就能发表评论，再点击一下就能与世界分享。我们会自动将你的反馈整理到仪表板中。点击-->评论-->分享&重复
localize.tagline: 在任何网站的顶部进行可视化协作

localize.description: 有了Capsule，你可以直接在任何網站的頂部進行合作並留下反饋。只需點擊一下就能發表評論，再點擊一下就能與世界分享。我們會自動將你的反饋整理到儀表板中。點擊-->評論-->分享&重複
localize.tagline: 在任何網站的頂部進行可視化協作

nodes.excerpt: VogueAI is a complete AI-driven solution for any digital content with fashion. This solution can take any movie, web series, or short videos and detect keyframes with uniques fashion trends in entire video sequences.
nodes.title: VogueAI - Automated fashion extraction from videos
nodes.author: Farooq Adam

localize.description: VogueAI是一个完整的AI驱动的解决方案，适用于任何与时尚有关的数字内容。该解决方案可以将任何电影、网络系列或短视频，在整个视频序列中检测具有独特时尚趋势的关键帧。
localize.tagline: 从视频中自动提取时装

localize.description: VogueAI是一個完整的AI驅動的解決方案，適用於任何與時尚有關的數字內容。該解決方案可以將任何電影、網絡系列或短視頻，在整個視頻序列中檢測具有獨特時尚趨勢的關鍵幀。
localize.tagline: 從視頻中自動提取時裝

nodes.excerpt: Version data, track models, train on custom clusters - without worrying about setting up infrastructure or cloud compute. Save on cloud costs by only paying for what you need. Run hyperparameter sweeps on multiple nodes with the click of a button.

nodes.author: Kenny Workman

localize.description: 版本数据、跟踪模型、在自定义集群上进行训练--无需担心设置基础设施或云计算。只需为您需要的东西付费，即可节省云计算成本。只需点击一个按钮，即可在多个节点上运行超参数扫描。

localize.tagline: 在雲上訓練、跟蹤和服務機器學習。

nodes.excerpt: Clipboard checker is an open source set it and forget it chrome extension that scans any text you copy in your browser to determine if malicious content has been added or changed.
nodes.title: Clipboard Checker - Keep your clipboard safe from JS injections.
nodes.author: Marijn Roukens

localize.description: 剪贴板检查器是一个开源的设置并忘记它的chrome扩展，它可以扫描你在浏览器中复制的任何文本，以确定是否有恶意内容被添加或更改。
localize.tagline: 保护你的剪贴板不被JS注入。

localize.description: 剪貼板檢查器是一個開源的設置並忘記它的chrome擴展，它可以掃描你在瀏覽器中複製的任何文本，以確定是否有惡意內容被添加或更改。
localize.tagline: 保護你的剪貼板不被JS注入。

nodes.excerpt: 365 & me is a simple journaling app that helps you to get to know yourself better. Answer a question a day to reflect about your life, see how you change over the years and celebrate your achievements!
nodes.title: 365 & me - Journaling app with daily questions to reflect
nodes.author: Alina Hang

localize.description: 365&我是一款简单的日记应用，帮助你更好的了解自己。每天回答一个问题来反思你的生活，看看你这些年的变化，并庆祝你的成就!
localize.tagline: 日记应用，每天都有问题需要反思

localize.description: 365&我是一款簡單的日記應用，幫助你更好的瞭解自己。每天回答一個問題來反思你的生活，看看你這些年的變化，並慶祝你的成就!

nodes.excerpt: Codeprints offers geeky wall art for nerds and developers. You can create a personalized print of your GitHub contributions to motivate you every day. A service created for developers by developers.

nodes.excerpt: LecturePro is a notes-assistant that helps students pay attention in class. It listens to the lecture with you, and also takes notes for you. You can download these notes and edit as well!
nodes.title: Lecture Pro - Notes-assistant for students across the globe!
nodes.author: meraj@code.in

localize.description: LecturePro是一款帮助学生在课堂上专心听讲的笔记助手。它和你一起听课，还能为你做笔记。你可以下载这些笔记，也可以进行编辑!
localize.tagline: 全球学生的笔记助手!

localize.description: LecturePro是一款幫助學生在課堂上專心聽講的筆記助手。它和你一起聽課，還能爲你做筆記。你可以下載這些筆記，也可以進行編輯!
localize.tagline: 全球學生的筆記助手!

nodes.excerpt: Unlike most calendars, Daybridge doesn’t confine you to a half-empty grid. So you’re free to structure your day exactly how you like. Mix events, tasks, and notes together in the same place.
nodes.title: Daybridge - A calendar built for people, not companies.
nodes.author: Jeff Eisley

localize.description: 与大多数日历不同的是，Daybridge 不会将你限制在一个半空的格子里。因此，你可以自由地按照自己的喜好来安排一天的工作。你可以将事件、任务和笔记混合在同一个地方。
localize.tagline: 一个为人而不是为公司打造的日历。

localize.description: 與大多數日曆不同的是，Daybridge 不會將你限制在一個半空的格子裏。因此，你可以自由地按照自己的喜好來安排一天的工作。你可以將事件、任務和筆記混合在同一個地方。
localize.tagline: 一個爲人而不是爲公司打造的日曆。
